title: >>> Drifting Toward DESTINY
body_text:
The biggest of them all is oh so near and never before has an event produced this much pure excitement and anticipation. The colossal, first-time main event, the extraordinary soundtrack fit for everyone, it's an endless list setting the stage for "the big one". Can you feel it?
And no matter how many times wars have been fought on the court, there isn't any doubt that the iconic warriors have become an indestructible unit!
Two brutal winters could have easily stopped the sport dead in its tracks, but it just wasn't meant to be. The desire and heart of those elite few kept on climbing, overcoming brutally low temperatures.
If the "Ice Ages" weren't enough, how about going into the emergency, or better yet, the operating room! Krott, DiBuccio, among a slew of other legends have suffered tremendous consequences thanks to the remorseless bulletballs. But the no fear, no quit attitude hasn't removed or erased those victims from the battlegrounds; a testiment to their guts and determination.
And who could forget the lamppost!? Seems like the so-called
Dark Days
produced more promise than first thought.
... Walls have been demolished, mountains arduously climbed, all in an effort to keep this sport and the unforgettable memories out of the grave. This is the ultimate reward, where sacfrices turn to gold. This magnificant, glorious journey is something never to be replicated ...
The COUNTDOWN to 100
Saturday, August 18 with Special Start time of 5pm
OH Tracks!
Over six and a half hours of non-stop music from the most recognized artists of yesterday and today! Chart-toppers from the Red Hot Chili Peppers, 311, Velvet Revolver; dance and R&B hits from Jay Z, La Bouche, and Nelly; and of course the party favorites - Spin Doctors, Sugar Ray, and more!
Hungry?
What would DODGEBALL 100 be without a few goodies!? Thanks to several of dodgeball's finest, there will be a nice array of food and drinks provided at this "summer sizzler".
The Pageantry
Streamers, lights, table cloths - the whole nine yards. It will truly be a sight to see.
The Number
"Expect More", what a perfect catchphrase. Will the world witness a brand new attendance record at this 100th spectacular?
3 ON 3
The most star-studded attraction ever! Dominating legends forced to duke it out in a never-before-seen six man war!
Kevin Fitzpatrick
,
Ryan Letsche
, and
John Tronolone
will take on
Justin Pierce
,
Mike Edwards
, and
Kevin Adams
in the ulimate battle for team supremacy and bragging rights! And again, with the expected turnout, who knows if smaller battles will break out!
Surprise, Surprise
Assuming there will be surprises like a 50/50 raffl ... Oops! Well anyway, it's all a part of the fun! Be on the look out!
... And when you step on to the court this Saturday night, be sure to thank yourself. Your hardwork and dedication have paid off. You deserve it.
body_html:
The biggest of them all is oh so near and never before has an event produced this much pure excitement and anticipation. The colossal, first-time main event, the extraordinary soundtrack fit for everyone, it's an endless list setting the stage for "the big one". Can you feel it?

And no matter how many times wars have been fought on the court, there isn't any doubt that the iconic warriors have become an indestructible unit!

Two brutal winters could have easily stopped the sport dead in its tracks, but it just wasn't meant to be. The desire and heart of those elite few kept on climbing, overcoming brutally low temperatures.

If the "Ice Ages" weren't enough, how about going into the emergency, or better yet, the operating room! Krott, DiBuccio, among a slew of other legends have suffered tremendous consequences thanks to the remorseless bulletballs. But the no fear, no quit attitude hasn't removed or erased those victims from the battlegrounds; a testiment to their guts and determination.

And who could forget the lamppost!? Seems like the so-called Dark Days produced more promise than first thought.

... Walls have been demolished, mountains arduously climbed, all in an effort to keep this sport and the unforgettable memories out of the grave. This is the ultimate reward, where sacfrices turn to gold. This magnificant, glorious journey is something never to be replicated ...

The COUNTDOWN to 100
Saturday, August 18 with Special Start time of 5pm

OH Tracks!
Over six and a half hours of non-stop music from the most recognized artists of yesterday and today! Chart-toppers from the Red Hot Chili Peppers, 311, Velvet Revolver; dance and R&B hits from Jay Z, La Bouche, and Nelly; and of course the party favorites - Spin Doctors, Sugar Ray, and more!

Hungry?
What would DODGEBALL 100 be without a few goodies!? Thanks to several of dodgeball's finest, there will be a nice array of food and drinks provided at this "summer sizzler".

The Pageantry
Streamers, lights, table cloths - the whole nine yards. It will truly be a sight to see.

The Number
"Expect More", what a perfect catchphrase. Will the world witness a brand new attendance record at this 100th spectacular?

3 ON 3
The most star-studded attraction ever! Dominating legends forced to duke it out in a never-before-seen six man war! Kevin Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, and John Tronolone will take on Justin Pierce, Mike Edwards, and Kevin Adams in the ulimate battle for team supremacy and bragging rights! And again, with the expected turnout, who knows if smaller battles will break out!

Surprise, Surprise
Assuming there will be surprises like a 50/50 raffl ... Oops! Well anyway, it's all a part of the fun! Be on the look out!


... And when you step on to the court this Saturday night, be sure to thank yourself. Your hardwork and dedication have paid off. You deserve it.
